00012   class FileRecord
00013     {
00014     public:
00015       FileRecord(int lumi, const std::string &file, const std::string &path);
00016       ~FileRecord() {}
00017 
00018       void   report(std::ostream &os, int indentation) const;
00019       void   setFileCounter(int i)         { fileCounter_ = i; }
00020       void   fileSystem(int);
00021       void   writeToSummaryCatalog();
00022       void   updateDatabase();
00023       void   insertFileInDatabase();
00024       void   moveFileToClosed();
00025       void   moveErrorFileToClosed();
00026       void   firstEntry(double d)          { firstEntry_ = d; }
00027       void   lastEntry(double d)           { lastEntry_  = d; }
00028       void   increaseFileSize(int i)       { fileSize_   += (long long) i; }
00029       void   increaseEventCount()          { events_++; }
00030       void   checkDirectories()      const;
00031       void   setRunNumber(int i)                      { runNumber_ = i; }
00032       void   setStreamLabel(const std::string &s)     { streamLabel_ = s;}
00033       void   setSetupLabel(const std::string &s)      { setupLabel_ = s;}
00034       void   setWhyClosed(int w)                      { whyClosed_  = w; }
00035       void   setadler(unsigned int s, unsigned int i) { adlerstream_ = s; adlerindex_ = i; }
00036       const std::string& fileName()  const { return fileName_; }
00037       const std::string& basePath()  const { return basePath_; }
00038       std::string fileSystem()       const { return basePath_ + fileSystem_; }
00039       std::string workingDir()       const { return basePath_ + fileSystem_ + workingDir_; }
00040       std::string fileCounterStr()   const;
00041       std::string filePath()         const;
00042       std::string completeFileName() const;
00043       std::string timeStamp(double)  const;
00044       std::string logFile()          const;
00045       std::string notFile()          const;
00046      
00047       int         lumiSection()      const { return lumiSection_; }
00048       int         fileCounter()      const { return fileCounter_; }
00049       long long   fileSize()         const { return fileSize_; }
00050       int         events()           const { return events_; } 
00051       double      lastEntry()        const { return lastEntry_; }
00052       double      firstEntry()       const { return firstEntry_; }
00053 
00054     private:
00055       boost::shared_ptr<stor::Parameter> smParameter_; 
00056 
00057       std::string  fileName_;                         // file name (w/o ending)
00058       std::string  basePath_;                         // base path name
00059       std::string  fileSystem_;                       // file system directory
00060       std::string  workingDir_;                       // current working directory
00061       std::string  logPath_;                          // log path
00062       std::string  logFile_;                          // log file including path
00063       std::string  setupLabel_;                       // setup label
00064       std::string  streamLabel_;                      // datastream label
00065       std::string  cmsver_;                           // CMSSW version string
00066       int          lumiSection_;                      // luminosity section  
00067       int          runNumber_;                        // runNumber
00068       int          fileCounter_;                      // number of files with fileName_ as name
00069       long long    fileSize_;                         // current file size
00070       int          events_;                           // total number of events
00071       double       firstEntry_;                       // time when last event was writen
00072       double       lastEntry_;                        // time when last event was writen
00073 
00074       int          whyClosed_;                        // record why file was closed 
00075                                                       // (0=open,1=stop,2=N-2lumi,3=timeout,4=size)
00076       unsigned int adlerstream_;                      // adler32 checksum for streamer file
00077       unsigned int adlerindex_;                       // adler32 checksum for index file
00078 
00079       void   checkDirectory(const std::string &) const;
00080       double calcPctDiff(long long, long long) const;
